name: Super Roboy
description: Deep in the Nevada desert, in a secret underground government facility, a young robot boy is awakened by an unknown force. He finds the building infected with alien creatures and hostile robots… With his memory wiped, he sets out to uncover secrets of his - and the facility’s - past.

name: Toaster Arena
description: Toaster Arena is a first person multiplayer arena shooter where players battle it out on different maps and game modes. Use Advanced movement to traverse obstacles or hop on some wheels and create carnage

name: Iron Roads
description: Lay tracks, buy trains, and set their routes using board game-inspired mechanics to optimise your network. Run your enterprise efficiently while avoiding backlogs, jams, or angry passengers, and you'll be recognised for the unsung train hero you know you are.

name: Holy Whore Emily
description: Making love is joyful. To become a priesthood holder who can keep making love is even more worshiped by the world. Emily loves this kind of life… You will play the role of the High Priestess and arrange for the Holy Maiden Emily to be engaged with various activities and H-acts.

name: Key Gunner
description:
Defeat waves of enemies by typing!

In Key Gunner, you are being attacked by waves and waves of enemies, and the only way to defeat them is by typing the letters floating above their heads!

The stronger the enemy, the more points it is worth. Type the letters in order and you get a bonus. But a typo will lose you points and stop your gun from firing for a short time. Compete for the top score on the high score tables!

name: Primeval
description:
Experience life as different dinosaurs and prehistoric creatures. Play as the plant eating herbivores, the meat-eating carnivores, and the fish-eating piscivores.

Roam the land, seas, and skies. Eat, grow, and survive in an unforgiving world filled with many species of creatures that can help you, be hunted, or hunt you.

Earn evolution points by eating, killing, and completing tasks. Spend those points to customize your creature's attributes such as damage or health.

Collect a hoard of items that can be used to strengthen your creatures, nests, and eggs.

62 playable species.

name: In Ten Years
description: In Ten Years is a piece of interactive fiction about a group of friends in a small town and the moments and places that draw them together

name: Chuck Nolemland
description: Maybe the hardest RAGE horror game ever..

name: Unseen
description: Anomaly finding game that takes place in an old apartament building

name: Who Is Who
description: This community project featuring 8 maps was created to get everyone to try out the role of another mapper. The aim was to create a map in the style of a random mapper among other project members.

name: The Haunting Eyes
description: The Haunting Eyes is a game in which you have to break into an abandoned mansion and solve its mystery by collecting bags of gold.

name: Shadow Baptism
description: This is a third-person shooter in which a wizard uses homing magic to fight enemies and collect hats.

name: Yuri Lowell Prints a Gun
description:
A short reflection on luigi mangione through the lens of media specifically Tales of Vesperia

Made for boshi's place Year of Luigi show

name: Soporfall
description:
A collection of five interactive narratives exploring a variety of dreamscapes which, interwoven, tell the story of a shattering dreamer.

Befriend fallen angels, spelunk impossible ruins, find love amidst regal bugs, get in poetry battles with forest critters or delve into a pastry-making bureaucracy. Soporfall valley is yours!

name: Aotenjo: Infinite Hands
description: The Mahjong Roguelike. Aotenjo is an deckbuilder where you will use Mahjong styles all over the world to beat innate threats, play different Patterns and combos, reach the "bottom" of Aotenjo, and discover ancient secrets....

name: Backrooms: Liminal Conflict
description: Backrooms: Liminal Conflict is a PvP backrooms game with different factions.

name: Dark Umbra
description: Fight against the Umbral Horde on your way to take down the sinister sorcerer who doomed the world. Team up with friends or go it alone as you level up your character and collect powerful relics in this action rogue-like.

name: Midnight Racer
description: Arcade sythwave car game. Hey there, champ, can't sleep? Had a tough day? Or maybe you just helped yourself relax? Sit back, relax to the synthwave beats. Turn off your brain, just watch, play, and relax.

name: Together After Dark
description: Together After Dark is a co-op horror psychological game with a survival touch for 1-4 players. 4 Teens are stuck in the forest and need to find a way out but they are not alone

name: ThroneForge: The Fortress War
description: Throneforge: The Fortress War:Build an arsenal of diverse towers, each with unique abilities and strengths.Strategically place towers along the enemy's path to maximize their impact and create impenetrable defense lines.

name: Lymbus
description: Descend into a digital labyrinth of our own making. Move around with your keys. Do everything else with your cards. Exercise maximum strategy in building your deck, then throw it out the window in screen-shaking, bullet hell-style battles. Combat happens in real time, meaning every moment matters.

name: Primeval
description: Experience life as different dinosaurs and prehistoric creatures from various parts of the ecosystem. Eat, grow, and survive in an unforgiving world.

name: Outbreak: Shades of Horror Chromatic Split Apocalyptic Collection
description: It's all out war in this collection of survival horror nightmares featuring Lydia Daniels. Can you survive the onslaught?

name: The Great Yokai of the Haunted Halls
description: You and your childhood friend Yua were supposed to just pick up a book from the decrepit building, but when a sudden twist of fate sends the two of you stumbling into a hidden realm teeming with spirits and yokai, it'll be up to you to find a way out! In this eerie supernatural dimension, you meet Izuna, who claims to be a great yokai with a fondness for humans. Can you escape this otherworldly realm, with the help of Izuna and the Kosaka sisters' spiritual powers?

name: Life And Death Are Predetermined by Heaven
description: Slapping Competition ": Two contestants stand face to face and alternate their attacks, using their maximum strength to slap each other's cheeks. The game will continue until one side is beaten and unable to get up

name: The Black Lamb
description: The Black Lamb is a folklore horror game inspired by eerie childhood tales and real-life events. After a tragic accident, you find yourself drawn to a mysterious black lamb. Following it leads you to an unsettling village—but this is no ordinary village. Dark secrets lurk within, and your only choice is to uncover the truth or succumb to the horrors around you.

name: From The Past
description: What hides in the depths of the forest?!

description: This is the latest map by Jon Landis in 28 years. It features a techbase with three levels of confusing ledges. Can you discover the secrets of the ledge maze?

Entidades is a survival game, which tells the story of a very mischievous boy, who lived in colonial Brazil, suffered from religious abuse and slavery at the time.

description: Build, manage, and thrive in Island Master! Procedural islands, resource control, citizen happiness. Become the ultimate Island Master in this top-down city builder.

name: Joy of Programming: Software Engineering Simulator
description: JOY OF PROGRAMMING - Software Engineering Simulator is an immersive 3D programming puzzle game about automating and controlling realistic machines, robots, drones and more using real Python code. Build actual coding skills while playing, solve exciting bite-sized programming challenges and progress to unlock new programming features and improved machinery. Prior programming knowledge recommended.

name: Eat or DIE!
description: The idea is simple bigger fish eats smaller fish and survives!

name: Moon Keys
description: "Moon Keys" is a 3D platformer focused on gameplay with a subtle story in the background. The game has three sections: underground, surface, and space. It’s played with 40 keyboard keys, which are randomly assigned. Each time a key is pressed, the assigned keys change.

name: Tales of Graces F Remastered: Deluxe Upgrade Pack
description: This pack contains the items included in the Deluxe Edition.

name: Spot Challenge Vol. 1
description: Spot Challenge is a game series inspired by 'Find the Differences,' where you compare two images and spot over 360 differences across 35 levels. Play solo or with friends and family—test your attention to detail in this fun challenge!

name: Bright Side: Quiz - Complete Edition
description: Compete with family and friends to uncover the ultimate quiz champion!

name: Breakout
description: A mini-roguelite boomer shooter FPS. Fight through over 70 procedurally linked combat arenas, upgrade your fighting abilities and destroy an ever increasing amount of enemy types.

description: Fight against brain-rot in this story-driven educational physics puzzle game. You will need to learn and apply high school physics concepts to solve increasingly challenging problems and uncover a galaxy spanning plot. When you have finished, you will be able to take a college level physics course.

description: Saber Survivors is a survival action roguelike where the evil galactic emperor has declared that all “Space Wizard Samurai” must be exterminated. You, a Space Wizard Samurai, must fight to survive. And your only weapon… a saber to deflect laser beams.

name: Cats and Seek: Toge Land
description: Celebrating the 16th anniversary of Toge Productions, we will explore Toge Land and greet the cats there.

name: Herbals Tycoon
description: "Herbals tycoon" is a game that combines ancient style with deep management strategy, bringing players into a mysterious and fantastic world of traditional Chinese medicine. Here, you are not only a healer but also an explorer, manager, and inheritor, writing your own herbal legend every moment.

name: Kubitori Dolls: Retriever - Shimazu Kaidan 01

name: For Sale
description: For Sale is a PSX-esque first-person horror adventure game with a strong emphasis on atmosphere and exploration. Interact with objects, take pictures using your digital camera, and discover unnerving secrets all while exploring a seemingly ordinary house.

name: 2025: Tobi
description: The second in Kibodo's classic game series. It is a vertical scrolling shooting game! Controls are left and right movement only. The game is over when the fighter runs out of bullets. Get items to replenish bullets and destroy the enemies in front of you! Aim for a high score!

name: Diddy
description: Destroy a dark party in Diddy's mansion. Gather your comrades Eminam and 51 Cent and save Justin B from Diddy! You can destroy the party with your friends by experiencing co-op

name: Casino Heist: Aruba
description: *Casino Heist: Aruba* is a comedic heist Visual Novel and dating sim where every choice counts. Assemble a team, craft the perfect plan, and tackle a high-stakes robbery targeting a shady casino. Can you outsmart the odds, secure a fortune, and maybe even find love? The score of a lifetime awaits!

name: Sex Club Simulator
description: SEX CLUB Simulator is a wild adult clicker game where you step into the shoes of a strip club manager on a mission to make the hottest spot in town.

name: Break.Up
description: break.up is a block-breaking roguelite all about bouncing your ball as high as it can go.

name: Orifoldium

name: A Coloring Break
description: Fill the blank patterns with colors and take a coloring break on paper.

name: Tales of Graces F Remastered: Deluxe Edition
description:
Tales of Graces f Remastered is an action RPG with high-speed battles that allow you to switch between fighting styles to match your play style. The remastered title adds more than 80 DLC packs and items release for the original and features stunning visuals, newly localized scenes available in English for the first time, and notable quality of life enhancements such as auto-save.

The Deluxe Edition includes:
• Tales of Graces f Remastered
• Battle BGM pack
• Digital Artbook & Soundtrack
• Super Growth Support Herb Set

name: Drunk Alien
description: Help this drunk alien find his way back to his spaceship in this challenging adventure!

name: Hyperchannel
description: This is a free shooting game. The game has very simple operations and beautiful graphics. Great for killing time.

name: Fork-U
description: Fork-U is a physics based forklift simulator. Drive and operate a forklift in 1st or 3rd person. Try your hand at loading and unloading pallets in a warehouse, delivering building materials in a construction site, keeping shelves stocked in a grocery store, and more!

name: Stage Cleared
description: You're just trying to beat a platformer, but something is stalking you outside. Keep an eye on your security cams while you’re gaming and stop the intruder from getting in. Stay sharp, or it’s game over.

name: No Give up
description: No Give up is a 2D Rouge+ strategy combination game.Heroes from different worlds are thrown into an unknown uninhabited planet, where there are only monsters and perhaps gods.Take up weapons, choose rewards, fight with monsters, and leave a legend of the unyielding……

name: Tales of Graces F Remastered
description: Tales of Graces f Remastered is an action RPG with high-speed battles that allow you to switch between fighting styles to match your play style. The remastered title adds more than 80 DLC packs and items release for the original and features stunning visuals, newly localized scenes available in English for the first time, and notable quality of life enhancements such as auto-save.

name: Overnight Watch
description: As a new hired employee of Paranormal Security you need to monitor live surveilance cameras and report any anomaly you can find. Can you find them all and will you survive?

name: Love & Cards
description: Porn and Cards is an adult visual novel/turn-based card game with stunning 2D visuals and a fun, immersive narration in the Galactic Wild West

name: Monster Meals
description: Monster Meals is a fast-paced cooking game where you control a small monster chef in your food truck, preparing meals with exotic creatures for monstrous customers. Serve quickly, or you’ll be on the menu!

name: Dynasty Warriors: Origins
description: Experience an unrivaled sense of realism on the battlefield, fueled by exhilarating 1 vs. 1,000 action and the rush of massive armies! A nameless hero conquers the turbulent and chaotic Three Kingdoms in this latest DYNASTY WARRIORS series entry.

name: Cyclopean: The Great Abyss
description: Cyclopean: The Great Abyss is a small scale, monochromatic CRPG in the style of Ultima, that takes place in the underworld of H.P. Lovecraft's Dreamlands.

name: Realtor
description: The year is 1998. Step into the shoes of a real estate professional, tasked with photographing a seemingly ordinary house for an upcoming sale. Explore the house, take pictures of each room an-... wait, what’s that in the last photo?

name: Dragon of Saiyu
description: Dragon of Saiyu retells the classic tale of Journey To The West in Retro 2D platformer style . Play as the young aspiring monk, Sanzang, and defeat strong foes in his quest of attaining the legendary scrolls from the Buddha of far west.

name: How to Lose One's Virginity
description: "How to Lose One's Virginity" is an adult visual novel that describes the process of self-discovery... and hot beauties. Playing the role of a loser, are you able to change your life and become someone women are very fond of and build your own harem?

name: Skystead Ranch
description: Transform a desolate sky island into a vibrant sanctuary. Using your enchanted crook, cultivate your garden, befriend quirky creatures, build a home, and unlock secrets along the way. Each choice adds a personal touch to your unique Skystead Ranch!

name: GhostCatcher
description: Ghost Catcher is a cooperative horror game that can be played by at least 1 and up to 8 players. You need to perform mysterious rituals in a haunted house, confront spirits, identify their true nature, and ultimately capture them.

name: Chase
description: Chase is a horror game with shooter and detective elements. The events take place in a dark and atmospheric world, you have to take on the role of a mercenary of the Inquisition, go to the dark forest of Blackwood and fulfill the terms of the contract.

name: Blade and Burden
description: Blade and Burden is a rogue lite dungeon crawler where different adventurers slash, roll, and solve their way through a trick filled tower in order to reach their own goals, whether that be to save a kidnapped royal, complete a contracted hit, or just to cure their boredom.

name: Asterism
description: Asterism is an interactive music album. A digital series of playable music videos that allow exploration and interaction within hand-crafted worlds that relate to the narrative of each music track. The narrative follows themes around personal expression, self-acceptance, anxiety and mental health.

name: Last Train Outta' Wormtown
description: Last Train Outta' Wormtown is a chaotic Sandworm vs. Cowboys showdown. The Worm can only detect players touching the sand, like "hot lava" with a giant sandworm twist! Work together, Complete the objectives, and get outta' Wormtown! - Or, play as the Worm and gobble up your friends!

name: Takara Cards
description:
Takara Cards is a fusion of deckbuilding and tactical RPG about chasing space dragons in a sci-fi fantasy universe.
Control a spaceship with Cards on a 3x3 Grid in Tactical Turn-based battles.

name: Battle Balls
description: Choose your favorite ball and play mini games!

name: Session: Skate Sim Year One & Two Edition
description: With the Year One & Two Edition of Session: Skate Sim, you get the base game and lots of additional content. Ride the most iconic spots, explore unique maps, meet and play as professional skaters.

name: The Sims 4: Casanova Cave Kit
description: Impress guests with a modern entertainment space and suave fits from The Sims 4 Casanova Cave Kit. This laid-back masculine fashion will have Sims looking confident, and the contemporary style of your den’s décor — a stylish bar, sleek coffee table, and more — will guarantee the right atmosphere, whether it’s game night or date night.

name: The Sims 4: Secret Sanctuary Kit
description: Indulge in iconic fashion and enchanting décor with The Sims 4 Secret Sanctuary Kit. Create a luxurious space full of opulent furniture concealed behind a secret passage in a bookcase. When you’re inside your hideaway, let the world melt away as you relax on your chaise lounge or try on polished Italian-inspired fashions in your floor-length mirror.

name: The Sims 4: Comfy Gamer Kit
description: Settle in for a cozy time at the computer with The Sims 4 Comfy Gamer Kit*. With this collection you’ll craft warm, inviting spaces that feel personal with a large desk, playful clutter items, and of course a comfy gaming chair. This kit was created in collaboration with Lilsimsie to be fun and relaxing with subtle references to The Sims.

name: Montezuma's Revenge: The 40th Anniversary Edition
description: The 1983 classic multi-room platformer Montezuma’s Revenge returns in 2.5D glory, and now Pedro’s adventure is bigger than ever with 100 tricky rooms to explore! For its 40th anniversary, what was once an unfinished game is now resurrected to match the full vision of creator Robert Jaeger. This time you can choose between male and female explorers, Pedro or his sister Rosita, to delve deep into the dangerous ruins and hunt for treasures untold!

name: Courageous Reasoning Nori 9 Reasoning Tournament Sticking Nori
description: Sin descripción

name: Fragance Point
description:
Fragance Point is a trippy 3D exploration game.

Fragrance Point is a digital paradise where you can do everything you want: Dress up, dance with aliens, and knock big things over. Make new friends, embarrass yourself in front of everyone, and you might just find a way into the station's core.

name: Punyan
description: Easy! Cute! But deep! A fun puzzle game with the cats of Nyanten Island, “PUNYAN”!

name: Doll Style: Underground Design and Dress
description: Create unique styles for your girls with casual urban looks! Combine clothes, hairstyles and accessories to shine on the streets.

name: Sugoi Girls: Tribal Crush
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Summer Girlfriend: Natsu Kano
description: Can the overly insensitive Yuichi find a girlfriend this summer!?

name: Golden Rails: Valuable Package - Collector's Edition
description: An exciting new adventure in the world of mail delivery!

name: Destination Paradise: Collector's Edition
description: Embark on a global adventure to uncover magic destinations.

name: The Hellspawn Spectrum
description: Ten massive, over the top, cheese, doom-cliché ridden levels featuring lots of Eternity Engine features like portals, scripting, slopes and more.

name: District: Evolution
description: Nintendo Switch Exclusive! Enjoy immersive battles with HD graphics! Stunning effects, weapon sounds, and team play create an immersive FPS experience!

name: Eggconsole Crimson PC-8801mkIISR
description: Carry on your late father's will and defeat the ferocious Crimson! XTAL SOFT presents a fully-fledged command-based RPG!

name: Let's Aim! Ring Toss
description:
Gear up for a carnival game classic: ring toss!
Win as many prizes as you can and become a ring toss master!

name: Shadows of Steam
description: Unravel the secrets hidden in the smog of Brassfall

name: Valhalla Mountain
description: Ascend Yggdrasil's surreal landscapes in this Norse-inspired puzzle adventure. Solve puzzles, twist geometry, and uncover a warrior's path to Valhalla.

name: Arcade Archives: Escape Kids
description: " ESCAPE KIDS " is a sports-action game released by KONAMI in 1987. ESCAPE KIDS has only one rule: run faster than everyone else. Use the “RUN” and “SUPER JUMP” buttons to win the future superhero race.

name: The Last Light
description: Rediscover a log lost love in a heartfelt journey through life's stages.

name: Rooftop Rascal: The Claus Cat
description: Sin descripción

developers.name: Christian Marcell de Oliveira trading as chroda

name: SantaCorps 4
description:
Armed with their merry mysticism, magical machines, and maybe a little bit of luck, it's up to YOU to make a miracle this holiday season...and beyond!

Don the fabled white and red solo or with up to 3 friends as you dash your way through this fast-paced holiday frenzy!

name: Slay the Alice
description: A short visual novel presented with pixel art and cute animations. Chasing after a rabbit, Alice found herself in a land of talking plants. Now, it's time to go on a tiny little adventure.

name: Dragon Ruins II
description: An indie dungeon crawler inspired by late 80s and early 90s CRPGs.

name: Cedric & Odious
description: Battle through a dark fantasy world as a resurrected warrior king. Once loyal friends, you now serve at the mercy of Odious, a brilliant but corrupt sorcerer. Master tactical combat and magical artifacts in this challenging action RPG.

name: PicoMix By NuSan
description:
PicoMix by NuSan features games made by creator NuSan over a 8 years period of time. It’s a compilation of works in multiple genres, like platform, puzzle, crafting, or base building for a total of about 20 fun games and experiments, some will provide hours of interesting challenges while others can be completed in a few minutes.

All of the games were made using “fantasy console” Pico 8 with its recognizable 16-color palette, crunchy sweet 128x128 resolution pixel art and 4-channel chiptune

Thanks to the use of Zepto 8 emulator, an optional wide mode is included in some of the games to go beyond Pico 8’s usual square screen, as well as visual filters to tweak your experience (scanlines, CRT, toon, minit...)

name: Scarlet Girls
description:
Commander, the girls await your call. Are you ready for this epic journey?

In the 119th year of the Old Euro Calendar, a mysterious catastrophe gave rise to crazed "Catastromechs" that swept through civilization. Survivors created new shelters and fused Catastromech cores with humans, creating powerful "Stellar Spirit" battle maidens. As Commander, lead these battle maidens to combat the Catastromechs, rebuild a new home called "Pax," and restore peace.

name: Magnitude: Epsilon
description: Chaos has not begun to subside below the microscopic level. Rogue electrons are still a threat to the safety of the nuclei. The core must remain protected.

name: Liar's Pub
description: Sin descripción

name: BattleHeights
description:
BattleHeights is a multiplayer party game combining elements of aerial combat, fantasy, and physics-based mechanics.

Players engage in matches across floating maps, using abilities like double jumps, grappling hooks, and wind spells to outmaneuver and outwit their opponents. The gameplay revolves around creative movement, strategic use of terrain, and team-based objectives in modes like King of the Hill, Team Deathmatch and other fun activities, like a Grappling Race.

The game features cartoony physics, emphasizing fun and laughter over competitive intensity.

name: Alchemy Laboratory: Simulator
description: Dive into a world of creation and discovery, where each element combines to form new ones. Experiment freely in this interactive sandbox. But be careful: every combination has its consequences..

name: Revenge of the Mage
description: RotM is an Action Roguelite FPS game where players get in the robes of a Mage. Let the hands of fate open ways for the power of your magic. Save the Multiverse to power up yourself! Unlock, collect, discover, live, die, repeat!

name: Yobarai Detective: Miasma Breaker
description:
Yobarai Detective: Miasma Breaker is an every-direction action shooter that emphasizes the exhilaration of defeating waves of enemy hordes.

The game uses a quest-based structure in which you clear quests, earn rewards, and use them to strengthen your characters for the next mission.

Skilfully dispose of the enemies coming at you from every direction and enjoy building up your characters.

name: Blob
description: Embark on a chemistry-packed adventure! Collect elemental blobs, combine them into powerful compounds, and build the ultimate periodic table collection. One element drop per hour, with more drops influenced by your blobventory!

name: Starlair
description: Fly through an endless universe visiting the planets of other users and taking on their challenges in a Metroidvania style game!

name: Randomax
description: Ride or drive the turbulent waves of luck toward victory! A novel rogue-lite vertical scrolling Shmup that puts your resourcefulness to the test.

name: Synduality: Echo of Ada - Ultimate Edition
description:
The Ultimate Edition includes:
• Synduality Echo of Ada
• Ultimate Edition Content
Be ready for anything with two new outfits, access to Ultimate Drifter Pass seasonal bonuses, and two special tickets - including one to obtain Mystere from SYNDUALITY Noir!
- Magus Costume School Uniform
- Magus Costume School Uniform Purple
- Ultimate Drifter Pass Voucher
- Magus Remake Ticket
- Mystere Magus Type Exchange Ticket

name: Synduality: Echo of Ada - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
• SYNDUALITY Echo of Ada
• Deluxe Edition Content
Be ready for anything with a new outfit, access to Deluxe Drifter Pass seasonal bonuses, and a Magus Remake Ticket!
- Magus Costume School Uniform
- Deluxe Drifter Pass Voucher
- Magus Remake Ticket

name: Egyptian Punishment
description: All slaves has to be punished for misdemeanor. Watch as the queen summons an exotic futa slave and orders her demonic beast to punish the girl's filthy fuck hole. Things get heated quickly, soon it’s the queen’s hole enjoys the slave’s shaft. It all ends with a well-deserved bath of monster cum!

name: Satan
description: Experience the thrill of retro boomer shooters in this action-packed game where you'll battle hordes of demons and face the ultimate challenge: Satan himself. Relive the glory days of classic shooters with intense gameplay, a variety of weapons, and relentless enemies.

name: Donkey Kong Country Returns HD
description:
Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong are back for some ground-pounding action in this HD version of Donkey Kong Country Returns, originally released on the Wii system.

Play solo, or with a buddy in local two-player co-op, in an adventure brimming with hijinks where you can stomp obstacles, send mine carts careening, fly high on rocket barrels and even hitch a ride on Rambi the Rhino.

Experience 80 a-peel-ing levels, including the additional ones from the Nintendo 3DS version.

name: Avian Colony
description: Avian Colony is a survival simulation game that places you in the role of the ruler of a floating colony in a harsh sky world. Your main goal is to ensure the survival and prosperity of your colony by managing resources, planning strategically, and defending against threats.

name: Nunholy
description: In a world overrun by vampires, nuns with their own stories have arrived at the Hunter's Guild. They are prepared to borrow even the power of demons if it means defeating their enemies. What fate awaits them?

name: Check Inn
description: Build hotels, accommodate guests and expand your hotel business throughout the world!

name: Save The Castle!
description: Save the Castle is an action packed VR tower defense that places you on the field of battle. Build your army, take over any tower and turn the tide of the war!

name: Hyper Flux
description: Hyper Flux is a single-player speedrunning 3D platformer that demands you to speed through shattered planets using your zero-gravity suit and force-manipulating orbs. Fly through the skies of insane levels to reach the end portal as fast as possible.

name: Robot Girl's Dream: Robot Battle Championship
description: This game is an RPG game that follows the growth of a robot girl who has lost her memories. Players can aim for victory in the robot battle tournament, the main objective, and also enjoy interactions with both humans and robots.

name: Things Too Ugly
description: Clock in at TEREBRO INC. for the night shift in 1986. Protect the company's legacy as Risk Assessment Data Processor. Equipped with era-specific technology, navigate through obscured narratives to shape the company's future.

name: Tribe Nation
description: Tribe Nation is a roguelike strategy with real-time battles set in the Gallic Wars era. Lead your Celtic tribe across Europe to a new homeland. Strategize on a randomly generated hex battlefield, adapt to unexpected events, craft, improve, and equip. Make your tribe a nation.

name: Waiting in the Lime Forest
description: Face your friend's twisted mind and do your best. You should stay sane until the end.

name: Arken Age
description: Arken Age is a VR action-adventure game set in the Bio-Chasm—a terraformed fantasy world created by the Grand Arborist. Engage in full physics combat using Arkenite infused swords & guns—and freely explore the densely filled environments under siege by Hyperion's neural corruption.

name: Blade Chimera
description: In this exploration-heavy 2D action game, use your demon sword to interfere with the past, create platforms, and shield yourself from danger to explore a dystopian cyberpunk world depicted in gorgeously animated pixel art.

name: Wizard Warfare 2: Cephalopod Wars
description: Wizard Warfare 2: Cephalopod Wars is the sequel to Wizard Warfare, a fantasy-themed, 4X-style, turn-based strategy game with a strategic empire management layer supported by a detailed tactical battle simulation layer. Now includes fully simulated naval battles.

name: Assetto Corsa EVO
description: Assetto Corsa EVO is the sequel to 2014’s racing simulator Assetto Corsa, which featured a range of road, track, racing, historic and drift cars as well as laser-scanned tracks

name: Kill a Million Rats
description: A roguelite bullet-heaven RTS, set in a forest invaded by an endless horde of Rats. As the Spirit of Vengeance, you must save the adorable, innocent animals. Explore a randomly generated world, harvest resources, rebuild the Hidden Village, recruit allies, and Kill a Million Rats!

name: Grim
description: Grim is an Exclusive VR Multiplayer Survival game where you must immerse yourself in its harsh landscapes, where survival is not just a choice but a grueling battle against nature and other desperate players. You must gather resources, craft, and build your base, all to stay alive.

name: Age of Water
description:
Age of Water is a new MMO game set in a post-apocalyptic Earth completely covered in water.

The rooftops of high-rise buildings and tops of other man-made and natural objects turned into islands, on which the surviving people built new settlements. Your adventure begins near one of them.

name: Fragrance Point
description: What went wrong on Fragrance Point? Explore, hang out, and poke around where you're not supposed to.

name: Hunter: The Reckoning - The Beast of Glenkildove
description: Full moon. Cold night. Dark shadow. Warm gun. The Beast of Glenkildove has stalked Ireland for centuries. Now, you must hunt it. A text-based interactive novel set in the World of Darkness.

name: 9 Lives to Defend
description: Face a pest infestation and survive until Loki's parents return from their trip! Defend the house with your 9 lives. Choose upgrades, and play with different versions of Loki, with unique weapons and abilities to fight this war ^.^

name: Football Coach: College Dynasty
description: A true college football management game. Play as a coach or a school, recruit players, develop your team, and compete for national championships. Build a college football dynasty in a realistic and customizable league with up to 90 teams.

name: Splittown
description: Cold War has split the world in two. The Great Divide spans across the globe with an impenetrable wall between the two blocs. You are Leonard Nimby; stone-faced agent of IM5, hot on the trail of a shrink gun stolen from you by a villanous mayoral candidate on the eve of a fateful election.

name: Tyrant's Realm
description: Tyrant's Realm is a challenging action roguelike. Fill your arsenal with weapons and armor each with their unique gameplay mechanics. Tread carefully in this dark fantasy world because every enemy you face could be your end.

name: DreadOut: Remastered Collection
description: Where the world of Dread begins!!

name: Hitman World of Assassination: Episode - Sapienza
description: Suit up as Agent 47 in this spy-thriller adventure where creativity is your deadliest weapon. Experience Sapienza, Italy, one of the many locations in the World of Assassination trilogy where your mission is to neutralize a lethal bioweapon and eliminate its creators.

name: Suikaiju
description: Play as a mad scientist with the goal of creating the biggest and mightiest Kaiju of all time! Merge Kaiju Cores, a fundamental material to trigger the evolution, into biggers ones. Repeat this process until your Kaiju can finally evolve. Can you make your little monster big enough to conquer the world?

name: Perfect Ninja Bundle
description: Save 20% with the bundle of four games: "Super Ninja Miner" and three part of "Perfect Ninja Painter"

name: Perfect Ninja Painter 3
description: New part of the puzzle platformer about ninja painters with new character, new features and new puzzles.

name: Turning the Page
description:
For Felix and Sophie Page, two professors at Riverside College, things are going very well. They have jobs they love, they are well respected and most importantly: they have each other. In fact, their recent marriage has made it official. Nothing could get between them... except maybe one of their students...

Turning the Page is a Visual Novel focused on Netorare and Corruption.

In particular, it is part of the “mystery NTR” subgenre, meaning that the player can choose to experience the story through either the hero’s point of view, with an obscured and limited view of what is happening, or from the heroine’s perspective which shows her being stolen away from the hero in complete detail.

name: YieldTrillions
description: Hello, I'm a corn alien, I need to start the ship and go home, please V I have 10000000000 pounds of corn for spaceship fuel and I'll give you half a pound of popcorn as a reward when I get home.

name: Prison Notes
description: Prison Notes is a RPG with text-based ADV and cultivation elements. You act as a young migrant worker, wrongly imprisoned in the prison known as "The Coral Reef".What challenges and adventures are awaiting? Will you finally find a way out? Your choices and actions will decide the end of your story.

name: Jailbreak Assault
description: In Jailbreak Assault, you're a prisoner on a daring mission to break free. Start with a key and a baton, outwit guards, destroy documents, and disable security systems. Arm yourself for the ultimate challenge: escaping the heavily fortified perimeter.

name: Up Island
description: The tides are rising and starts to flood your island. The only way to escape, is to find your boat at the top of the island and sail away. You must hurry before the flood takes you away.

name: Well Dumb
description: It's a simple swiping game. You catch fish from a well. Trade fish with other players. Regular updates and fish drop events! Happy Fishing!

name: Silent Signals
description: Hack the System. Uncover the Truth

name: Samurai Brothers
description: Samurai Brothers is a fast paced shared-screen multiplayer game. In addition to the solo mode, two modes are available for multiplayer games. Do you want to fight against your friends ? Or work as a team against the multitude of enemies ?

name: Tenshi
description: Don't Blink. They're Always Watching. Enter the haunting corridors of the Fukushima asylum, a short but intense bodycam-style horror game that will leave you breathless.

name: Culinary Tour
description:
The Forgotten Culinary World, Rediscovered and Continued by You!

The food of various countries is personified as a anime, helping you in the whole process! Your favorite food will transform into a unique culinary elf, accompanying you through various difficulties and obstacles in a different world, so that you are no longer lonely.

With just one click, the Food Elf can easily sweep away evil monsters for you; One click harvest allows you to quickly obtain the resources you need! Let's talk together online and save another world, while offline, we'll lay flat and reap abundant rewards.

In addition to maintaining peace in other worlds, it can also cultivate the favorability of food elves and add combat power to you! Which type of food spirit do you like?

One handed operation, easy and casual~Hidden battles, automatic level clearing, multi line advancement saves more time! Diverse gameplay, experience different worlds.

name: So Many Zombies
description: So Many Zombies! is a fast-paced top-down shooter with rogue-lite elements that pits you against relentless waves of the undead. Face heart-pounding action and test your skills in a chaotic, bullet-filled battlefield where every second counts. How long can you last against the swarm?

name: Phantom's Estate
description: Phantom's Estate is a Survival Horror game where you have the choice of going in solo, or gathering your friends to hunt for the dead. Be aware though as these ghosts have been reported to track and learn your mistakes while you explore...

name: Warranty Not Included
description: Warranty Not Included is a fun and accessible VR shooter perfect for newcomers. Practice your aim in various ranges and blast away at hordes of robotic enemies. Join the Resistance Now!

name: Malleus Cocconum: The Heiress
description: You were Arenda Finch, a fifteen-year-old girl who had inherited a vast fortune. Expelled from your old school, you were transferred to a new school located within Dunkenwood House. The dark side of elitism awaited. Humanity or demonic nature? Love or desire? Your choices would determine her fate.

name: The Road To Harvest: Food From Across The Ocean
description: Become the God of Harvest, explore the world of food and adventure, plant, trade, and spread deliciousness to create your own path to prosperity!

name: Trapped: Family Vacation
description: Spot the differences, but each room has a survival rule.

name: The Spy I Married
description: Sin descripción

name: Our Summer Crush
description: Sin descripción

name: Sokorobot
description: In this puzzle game, a robot need to clear paths to unlock new levels!

In 2015, aliens visited the United States.

In 2115, they came back.

name: Sanguis Luna
description:
Wake up in the darkness of a cold, unfamiliar cellar, with the distant echo of footsteps that shouldn't be there.

Sanguis Luna throws you into a living nightmare, where every shadow hides a secret and every sound fills you with growing terror. You are alone, with no memory of how you ended up in that cursed house, but one thing is certain: someone, or something, is watching you...

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Paean of Era Nova
description:
Version 3.0 of Honkai: Star Rail is the game's second major post-release update, and it includes:
• New characters: The Herta, Aglaea, and the Remembrance path for the Trailblazer
• New character path: Remembrance
• New Trailblaze mission
• New planet: Amphoreus
• New quality of life updates
• …and more!

name: Dead Streets: Zombie Blitz
description: Dive into the adrenaline-pumping action of Dead Streets: Zombie Blitz, where the fate of the city rests in your hands! This action-packed shooter throws you into a city overrun by the undead, transforming every corner into a battle for survival.

name: Chicken Hill
description: Find 250 Genjouin of various species and hundreds of items for brother KUN. Rescue your frustrated and devastated brother KUN in the KUN space. We are the most devout believers.

name: Aleator
description: Can Debt-laden gamblers grab at straws and escape, or plunge into a bottomless pit

name: Deckarium
description: A deck-building pet simulator. Play pet cards to populate your terrarium or aquarium, be on the lookout for card-packs to expand your deck, keep your creatures fed to collect coins, and use them to buy more pets! But look out for ghosts! They hunger for the souls of your pets.

name: Piworld
description: First pixel 2D game, which include MMO and PVP system for anyone, who wants to try something new.

name: Strigoi
description:
"We, my sister and I, have long lived abroad, together with the longing for our homeland. Not long ago, we received an invitation to a party in Romania, in the Carpathians. My sister, without hesitation, got into the car and left. I refused to go, but after some time I received a terrifying message from my sister. Frightened, I dropped everything and quickly set out to find her. I wonder what happened?"

Strigoi is a first-person horror shooter set in the Carpathian Mountains. You will face various enemies (Vampires, Strigoi...), encounter interesting puzzles, and find different items that will help you overcome obstacles and enemies.

name: Pollen
description: Immerse yourself in a thrilling maze escape game where your sense is limited, and danger lurks around every corner. Can you outsmart everyone and find your way out?

name: Winged
description: A platform game with map that unlocks books! And the books are part of the gameplay, because it is through them that the characters gain new "wings", a metaphor for the concept of "wings of the imagination" that books teach us. This game innovates by blending literature and games in a harmonious way.

name: Battleships Collide: Space Shooter
description: Battleships Collide: Explore 3D space, defend the galaxy, and conquer 20 intense levels. Customize your spaceship, collect artifacts for hyper space travels in this thrilling shooter game and become the hero galaxies await!

name: The Roottrees Are Dead
description: A genealogical mystery straight out of 1998. Scour the early Internet for clues, uncover hidden connections, and piece together the family tree behind the secretive Roottree Corporation.

name: Umbra: The Last Summoner
description: As the sole summoner, step into the mystical realm of Umbra to rescue it from the encroaching demon army emerging from dimensional rifts. To end this invasion, call upon 60 diverse heroes, each with unique abilities, and engage in strategic, round-based RPG battles.

name: Ancient Kingdoms
description: Explore a vast open world filled with unique creatures and dungeons. Choose from six powerful classes and embark on an epic fantasy journey in this RPG. Play alone or with your friends (up to 4 players)

name: Endless Alice
description: "Endless Alice" combines Rogue-lite random elements with RPG strategic character development. In the game, you can explore maps to collect enhancement elements and interact with various creatures to gain special effects or alter gameplay.

name: Harvest Hills
description: Harvest Hills is a charming and relaxing farm simulator that allows you to run your own rancho. Cultivate various crops, take care of animals, and produce homemade products. Sell the goods in the local market to earn money and use it to upgrade or automate the farm.

name: Dealer's Life Legend
description: Undertake the perilous Quest of the Wandering Merchant and become a Legend in yet another outstanding installment to your favorite haggling tycoon phenomenon Dealer's Life!

name: The Lies We Tell Ourselves
description: The Lies We Tell Ourselves is an episodic first person psychological action-adventure game with introspective/horror elements and a focus on subtle storytelling and atmosphere.

name: Farm Wars
description: Set a price for your farm and protect it. Your shapeshifter farmer will help you harvest your farm and destroy your rival’s farm. Farm Wars is a top-down PvP farm game against time. Create a strategy for your opponent and purchase their farm. Pay attention to the mines while making your attack!

name: Aloft
description: Survive on floating islands caught in an eternal hurricane in this atmospheric sandbox survival indie game. Build your base and sail the winds to discover new islands and fight back fungi corruption while upgrading your gear. Reach the highest altitudes and brave their challenges.

name: Broken Alliance
description: From the makers of Death and Taxes comes a turn-based adventure-strategy game. Play as one of 4 distinct factions, harnessing the vast power of magic to save your dying world. The way you play determines the sacrifices and consequences you have to endure, shaping your personal storyline.

name: Wormventures: Barrier 51
description: A classic 3D cartoon point & click adventure game. Help Looky the worm to save planet Vermis!

name: Age of Darkness: Final Stand
description: Age of Darkness: Final Stand is a dark fantasy survival RTS where you must illuminate, build and defend humanity’s last bastion against hordes of Nightmares. Set in the remnants of a kingdom consumed by a deadly fog, you decide. Will you hide in the light? Or take back your world.

name: Wet Nightmares
description: As another woman joins the list of the missing, deep within a forest, a man living in solitude is visited by a pretty stranger. Wet Nightmares is an Erotic Horror Visual Novel exploring the psyche of a haunted man and his depraved past.

name: Momibosu
description: A boy and a girl, who have a mysterious weapon, a drone, set out on an adventurous journey from their small underground village to the vast world, aiming for a new world. Enjoy "Momibosu," a high-tempo road movie-like 2D action game that will make you want to play over again and again.

name: RaidLand
description: RaidLand is a rerelease of the original game by SideQuest Software. In this fantasy rpg you play as the Hunter, Warrior or Berserker in Team Greed mode. Hunt & kill your opponents, steal & hoard gold for victory. Level up, unlock skill perks & masteries in each class!

name: Gunship Battle: Total Warfare
description:
Battle enemy units to defend your base and save the world. Gunship Battle is now back as a new MMO Strategy game, Gunship Battle Total Warfare!

Become an Admiral and lead your troops to end the battle and dominate the ocean.

Game Features:

BUILD YOUR ARMY BASE

- Build powerful Ships, Jets, and Armor Units and form your own strategy against Armada.

- Defend your Headquarters from incoming enemies trying to take over your land.

- Battle Real-time PvP with other Admirals from around the world.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR ARMY

- Camouflage your Ships with your own design and patterns.

- Research various subjects and advance battle strategies.

JOIN ALLIANCE

- Dominate the ocean by creating or joining an alliance and assemble an unstoppable force.

- Help your Alliance by supporting their actions.

Rule over not only the ocean but also the sky with your army!

Download now to start your new journey as Admiral.

name: Orbital Cascade
description: A puzzle game inspired by classics like Zuma, where you pop colorful bullets, unleash dazzling combos, and rise to conquer the skies. Strategize your moves, master the challenge, and claim victory!

name: Jump Truck
description: Hop over gaps, flip between rooftops and launch yourself through an entire planet to become the fastest truck in the universe. Jump Truck is a 3D racing game about finding shortcuts and executing crazy aerials.

name: Bear Jump
description: Step into the bouncy world of Bear Jump! Help a determined bear jump endlessly upward, dodging obstacles, collecting power-ups, and reaching new heights. With intuitive controls and addictive gameplay, Bear Jump is easy to pick up but challenging to master.

name: Whack Mole
description: The player gets ready to face moles popping up from various holes. As the game advances, the speed and frequency of the moles' appearances increase, challenging the player's reflexes and hand-eye coordination.

name: Whispers in the Wood
description: Whispers in the Forest is a single-player base defense strategy game where you must build, upgrade, and defend your base against demonic creatures in a cursed forest. Manage your resources, lead your troops, and survive the darkness of the night as you fight to protect your only hope for salvation.

name: Aisera's Ladder
description: Come and experience the fast and exciting cold weapon battles! Understand the vast world of Azeroth in battle; By using exquisite combat skills to defeat the weak, managing a farm to produce food, and running a tavern to accumulate gold coins and upgrade equipment.

name: Enerdusk
description: "Enerdusk" is a roguelike deck-building game where you develop strategies centered on units while utilizing cards. Decks and items empower your units, and in turn, your units enhance your deck and shift the battle in your favor. Master this synergy to dominate all your enemies.

name: Ninth Hotel
description: You are trapped in a Hotel by accident Find out all the signs of abnormality in the hallway Escape by going down to the first floor while carefully observing your surroundings

name: LeftRedRightBlue
description: Sin descripción

name: Smash Zombies
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragonsweeper
description: A minesweeper game that requires observation by mixing roguelike elements with the classic gameplay.

name: Love, Internet, and Murder Magic
description: Love, Internet, and Murder Magic is a Roguelike game. You will role-play an agent of a streamer who died because of a murder. You are trying to "bring her back" through AI technology on the Internet, making her the unique creation of the Internet.

name: Fortnite Festival: Season 7
description: Sin descripción

name: Clothing Supermarket Store Simulator
description: Unleash your inner fashion mogul in Clothing Supermarket Store Simulator! This immersive game combines the bustling world of supermarket management with the exciting world of fashion retail. Build your dream clothing empire, from a cozy boutique to a sprawling fashion megastore.

name: Threefold Recital
description: Threefold Recital is set in an oriental fantasy world where the metropolis of Bluescales faces turmoil after a long golden age. The mix of magic, modern, and ancient technologies challenges governance, while tensions between humans, beastlings, and dragons grow. In the shadows, a crisis looms. A 2D platformer with puzzles.

name: Game of Fate 2: A Century's Promise
description: Transported back a century by fate, you find yourself in a legendary tale of vengeance. Amidst powerful enemies in a tumultuous era, your mission is to assist those around you. Experience this immersive epic from a first-person perspective—authentic, weighty, yet brimming with hope.

name: Eternal Night Glory
description: From the beginning, you've got all the cards. Now, command the garrisons of the Gate of Radiance to stop them from approaching.

name: My House
description: 3D Action Shooter, Tower Defence Game. Kill monsters. Buy items for defence. Save Your House.

name: Templar
description: Templar is a 2D indie platformer and hack and slash game.

name: Block Blaster DX!
description: New block puzzle game, offering a relaxing yet challenging experience for all ages.

name: Relentless Expanse
description: Capture and upgrade planets, outsmart your enemies, and conquer the galaxy! Simple yet addicting, you can play alone or outsmart your friends in this 2D top-down space RTS. Completely free, no monetization, just fun!

name: Sports Girl: Village
description: Lucy is a sporty girl, this time she comes to a deserted village, in order to obtain the ancient magic, restore the girls who have been petrified by the spell, she needs to find 18 objects to make magic. There are 24 beautiful girls waiting to be rescued.

name: Heroes of Hammerwatch II
description: A rogue-lite that offers extensive persistent progression. Build your town, upgrade and equip your heroes, before taking on the the ever-changing Dark Citadel - either solo or with a team of friends.

name: Another Way of Gettin' Paid
description: As Shunji's various acquaintances begin to interact in ways they were never supposed to, he finds his social circle expanding farther than he could have ever imagined...

name: The Moon Ate the Sun
description: Defeat hordes of enemies, upgrade your weapons and abilities as the evil Moon that was dormant for millennia.

name: Forest of Perdition 2: The School Trip
description: James Everhart and his classmates embark on a school trip to the abandoned Tranquil Hills, a forest park shrouded in mysteries and horrors. As they explore the area, they uncover dark secrets and confront malevolent forces that threaten their lives and the truth of the past.

name: Sailing Alone: Aftermath
description: Sailing alone: Aftermath is a post-apocalyptic nautical survival game where players navigate their ships through an infinitely vast open world, exploring endless oceans and lands, playing any role you desire, and penning their own legendary tale of survival in the apocalypse.

name: SickWay VR
description: Sickway is a realistic VR game where you drive a two wheeled electric vehicle in the heights of the city with the goal of getting down. Good advice: Avoid falling down! You can use your creative abilities in track editor, or you can become the fastest among your friends in multiplayer maps.

name: Try to Survive Today
description: A three-dimensional shooter with an isometric camera or a first- or third-person view. You in a fur suit shoot all sorts of devils and robots spawning from everywhere. By gaining experience for destroying enemies, collecting their souls, you upgrade your tree of characteristics

name: Bored Wife
description: Mrs. Moore, an bored housewife, finds herself trapped in the monotony of her life. She feels the invisible chains of family duties, lost in the routine. Then, unexpectedly, a unique opportunity secretly presents itself to her, offering a chance to change her life.

name: Nagi no Koi
description: A Japanese-style visual novel where two stories intersect.

name: Asfalia: Fear
description: Adventure awaits you in this colorful, family-friendly point-and-click delight! Navigate through a world painted with emotions, where even 'fear' becomes a playful friend. Solve puzzles, collect stickers, and share giggles in a heartwarming journey in the world of emotions.

name: Sword of Jade: Parallel Dreams
description: A lengthy fantasy adventure role playing game based around a day/night cycle, customizing your heroes, and a storyline where every choice has an impact on the story. Upgraded from it's original MS-DOS release to run natively on all platforms with QOL updates!

name: Hyper Light Breaker
description: Enter the Overgrowth, a new land in the world of Hyper Light. Play alone or with friends to explore massive biomes, defeat brutal monsters, create new builds, survive the mysterious Crowns and overthrow the almighty Abyss King in this adventure from the creators of Hyper Light Drifter.

name: Annihilate the Spance
description: Annihilate The Spance is a real-time strategic base builder with vast, semi-autonomous fleets. Construct your base and provide your automated armada with the means to annihilate the enemy through calculated unit compositions and rapid on-the-fly adjustments.

name: The Machines Arena
description: The Machines Arena is an adrenaline-fueled 4v4 top-down hero shooter where players compete in chaotic close quarters combat to plant bombs, deliver payloads and rack up kills in a growing number of game modes. Choose between 9 unique characters spread across 3 distinct roles and dive right into the action. Find your hero, hone your skills, and dominate the arena.

name: Pirates VR: Jolly Roger
description: Pirates VR Jolly Roger is a game alluding to old stories of the all-time most famous Pirates. The journey into the pirate world begins on a deserted island. Despite its extraordinary charm, the land hides a number of secrets and mysteries to be solved as well as obstacles and traps.

name: World of Warships: Legends - Jump-Start 7
description: Enhance your fleet with Kolberg A—a Premium version of German Tier II cruiser Kolberg, and stock up on credits, camouflages, Boosters, and Premium Account time.

name: Puzzle Adventures: Sea Animals
description: Easy to use puzzles for toddlers and kids. Featuring funny and cute animal motifs with 30 unique puzzles. 100% frustration free and child-safe.

name: Shinya Ichi-ji no Koukanshu
description: Have you heard the rumor? If you call a certain number at 1am, you will be connected to a person called the 1am operator. This person is said to be able to connect you to the past.

name: Sebastian's Quest
description: In Sebastian's Quest, you have to shove gems and find the cheese.

name: Return to Campus
description: An open world school game, you can bully your classmates, collect protection fees, go to the supermarket to make zero-dollar purchases, or even blow up the school. Of course, you can also study hard and exchange ideas with your classmates.

name: What Is This Sorcery
description: WITS (What Is This Sorcery) is an immersive digital trading card game (TCG) that brings together the classic appeal of card collecting with the dynamic interactivity of online gaming. Set against a backdrop of enchantment and strategy, WITS challenges players to master the art of magical combat, using a diverse array of cards that represent mythical creatures, arcane spells, and cunning tactics.

name: Constantine Scores
description: Constantine Scores is a single-player heisting Sci-fi First Person Shooter. Upgrade your arsenal to gain more abilities, weapons, and perks to keep the playing field equal. Fight against three separate factions, spanning multiple contracts, and randomized multi-day campaigns.https://

name: Magic Book Auto Battler
description: Magicbook AutoBattler is a non-traditional strategy game that combines Roguelite moves. This game has unique binding combinations, rich weapons and equipment, cool magical effects, and thrilling combat scenes. In the world of magic books, you will face endless challenges and rewards……

name: Platzle
description: Sin descripción

name: Jigsaw USA
description: Jigsaw USA is an exciting puzzle game that challenges players to complete puzzles as quickly as possible to earn top scores. Compete with players worldwide to achieve the fastest completion times and secure your place at the top of the global leaderboards. As players race against the clock, they also get to explore iconic moments, notable figures, and landmarks from American history, making the game both thrilling and educational.

name: Paranormal Night Shift
description: Paranormal Night Shift is an observation and spot the anomaly game set in a haunted house in the 1980s.

name: TeeDee
description: A minimalist 2D tower defense game with 3 towers, 6 maps, and 4 monster types. Simple, fun, and perfect for quick strategy sessions!

name: Dead Rush
description: DEAD RUSH - This is a dynamic first-person shooter in which you must confront hordes of hungry zombies! There's no convoluted plot, side quests and a large open world. Here you will find only concentrated action. The only thing you will be doing in this game is shooting at the crowd of reanimated dead. Explore the location, find the most powerful gun and destroy ten waves of zombies before they reach you!

name: Dynasty Warriors: Origins - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Digital Deluxe Edition pre-order bonus:
- Early access
Provides access to the game 72 hours before the official release.

name: Toy Shop Simulator
description: Run your own toy store! Arrange shelves, set prices, process payments, and manage staff. Expand and design your shop, handle online orders, deliver with a scooter, trade rare toys, and ensure security. Create a magical shopping experience in Toy Shop Simulator!

name: Janken Horn
description: Janken Horn is a "Rock Paper Scissors" card game. When a simple luck testing game suddenly becomes a strategy game, you will understand. Why does it make you think so much when all you need to do is to pick one from Rock/Paper/Scissors?

name: Alpaca Party
description: Alpaca Party is a free VR Party game. In this game, you can enjoy thrilling Werewolf gameplay, strategize with friends. You can also explore mysterious realms through portals,Whether you love strategic puzzles or relaxed social play, Alpaca Party has something for everyone.

name: Nine-Ball Roulette
description: This will be the most exciting pool game you have ever played. Join up to 3 of your friends in this exciting pool roulette game! Eliminate each other with pool until only one person is left.

name: TrickShot Simulator
description:
This Game is a simulator game.
A player experiences realistic trickshot challenges.

name: Willie's Nightfall
description: Willie's Nightfall is a first-person horror game. Explore the eerie offices of Willie's Company in search of secret documents. But you're not alone. The sinister company mascot, Willie—a distorted, murderous mouse—is hunting you down.

name: Lern Island Letters
description: Lern Island Letters is a short narrative game where you play as a postman, sorting the mail of the five intriguing residents of a remote island. Pick up on their peculiar habits through hints on the envelopes, discover their secrets, and try to save this peaceful haven from its fate.

name: Deadbeat
description: Make your voice heard in this isometric Action-RPG where quick thinking and patience guide the way to victory. In a hazy Hereafter that's not heaven or hell, fight bizarre demons, call your friends, and explore the deepest reaches of death.

name: Wasteland Chronicles
description: Wasteland Chronicles is a card based turn based combat game adapted from ancient mythology, featuring forty different styles and skills of Wasteland gods who will help players complete their journey from Chaos to the Jedi Sky Pass.

name: Nurikabe World
description: Nurikabe World is a relaxing logic puzzle game where you solve puzzles by creating islands and connecting rivers to create beautiful sceneries. Experience different landscapes and seasons, solve puzzle campaigns and create your own levels.

name: Endeavor
description: A sci-fi real-time strategy game with free form base building and all of the typical features found in classic RTS offerings. Construct a base, collect resources, build defenses, train an army, research technology and destroy the enemy. Manage your army with unit formations, patrol routes and attack groups, reveal the enemy through fog of war, monitor the battlefield with radar, one-click support abilities, unique unit attacks, hero units, etc. Combat balanced with a rock-paper-scissor approach to unit balance.

name: Super Puzzled Cat
description: Help Puzzled Cat use jetpacks, portals, bombs, gum, and more to conquer treacherous platforming stages. Play your own way using save states to explore a world full of challenges and secrets - but can you find the way through? Travel through time and space and reach enlightenment.

name: Lamu
description: Lamu is an adventurous, single-player 2D RPG game.Improve your farm during the day.Protect your friends at night and battle enemies.

name: Personal Finance Simulator
description: Choose how much money you start with, a profession, and a city, then make personal financial decisions! Will you end up rich or end up getting evicted?

name: The Witch's Assistant
description: A sexually explicit visual novel in which the player assists a Witch to run her potion selling business.

name: The Haunting of Joni Evers
description: The Haunting of Joni Evers is a psychologically thrilling first-person strollplayer set in the small town of Harvest, Oklahoma. Confront, examine, and reexamine Joni’s memories in this emotional story of estranged family underscored by a malevolent, interdimensional haunting.

name: The Dream Within
description: A pixel-graphics open world survival craft RPG, where players are locked in a deep dream world, survive and rescue yourself in this unstable world, forage, hunt, mine, and build up shelters. Find a way to escape.

name: Edd-E
description: Edd-E is a pixel-art game maker with custom visual scripting and publishing platform. Create games and Publish them with just one click. Play games from other creators or edit them. Learn programming and game development!

name: Airborne Empire
description: Build, manage, and grow your unique city in the skies. Traverse a vast and rich open world full of exotic technologies, relentless dangers, and many hidden treasures. Defend your inhabitants – and the kingdoms below! – from destructive attacks. Only daring leaders can reforge the Airborne Empire!

name: Transfusion
description: A VR game where you slice alien enemies into tiny pieces!

name: Rogue Hex
description: Craft your deck of cards to conquer the world in the Roguelite 4x. Explore mysterious lands. Survive against the barbarian horde. Expand and build dynamic cities. Discover over 200 game-changing techs. Grow your stone age empire into the stars!

name: Dreaming Isles
description: A colorful sandbox action RPG and life sim that combines sword and sorcery, high seas adventure, farming, and relationship building. Unite the clans of the Dreaming Isles, farm the land, start a family, and find your purpose.

name: Final Knight
description: Retro console-style beat 'em up action RPG, Giant weapons, massive monsters, Lightning Ring, 9 fantasy classes, and Sword of Legend.

name: Bleeding Code
description: Bleeding Code is a psychological horror game set in a decaying fantasy world long abandoned by its creator. As an unnamed traveler, you must collect the pieces of the shattered kingdom and uncover the truth behind its downfall while trying to keep your sanity and evading a sinister group who want to complete a mysterious ritual tied to the creator’s disappearance

name: ColdWire
description: ColdWire is a limit-removing mapset that aims to combine modern visuals with classically inspired gameplay. Boasting a bespoke custom palette and a tailor-made texture set, the maps in ColdWire aim to create a strong and inviting atmosphere while keeping the player on their toes with IWAD-esque but nonetheless thrilling combat. The player is going to traverse through roughly an episode's worth of techbases and urban environments in search for answers to a traffic accident of historical magnitude.

name: Mystic Rest Stop
description: Welcome to your new summer job. Arthur Brooks, a 22 year old, starts a night job at Moon Gas Station. As he settles in, he experiences strange events that unsettle him. The urban legends about the gas station seem to come to life. Dealing with customers at night is deeply unsettling.

name: Dungeon Vending Machines
description: Dungeon Vending Machines is a relaxing, casual idle game. Where you run vending machines in a dungeon! As adventurers brave dangerous depths, you’ll be their lifeline. Expand your machine lineup, grow your profits, and become the ultimate dungeon supplier!

name: Moon Tower
description: Play as a mechanical being, defeat all enemies, and retrieve the crucial item. Moon Tower is a fast-paced game where you must constantly dodge enemies and eliminate them within each room. Gain different abilities to strengthen yourself and enhance your power.

name: Gem's Hentai: Ultimate Puzzle
description: With very high quality illustrations made by a real artist, this is the ultimate puzzle. You should arrange pieces and enjoy artistry, have fun.

name: Vysions
description: Welcome to Vysions, a world made of dreams, where puzzles are truth and you must bring meaning to their madness.

name: Outbreak: Tenth Anniversary Celebration Collection
description: Celebrate ten years of undead horror!

name: Circle of Nature
description: Sin descripción

name: Forgotten Spirit
description: Forgotten spirit is a first-person hardcore action game set in a fantasy world. Become a disturbed ghost and get ready to fight your enemies, parkour and explore.

name: World Pole Stone Dusk: Diadem of the Pole
description:
The World Pole shattered, and with its destruction emerged a rusted fog that settled fast throughout the world.

Traverse through the desolate Stone Dusk to retrieve the sacred artifact destined for your grasp.

name: One Room: Yui Hanasaka Memorial
description: A new immersive animated novel game where you can experience the story of Yui Hanasaka, the main heroine of the popular short anime series OneRoom, from the protagonist’s point of view.

name: Gummy Jump 2
description: You just emerged from the depths of the colossal machine, only to find that its vastness far exceeds your wildest imagination. The metallic walls tower over you, casting long shadows that shift ominously as you explore your surroundings. As you take in the intricate machinery around you

name: Salvo Subs
description: Destroy your friends online in Salvo Subs, a retro inspired top-down shooter. Unlock 32 submarine vessels in 10+ arena game modes.

name: Terra Exodus
description: Defend the evacuation of Terra on the losing side of an alien invasion. This experimental action strategy game breaks out of genre norms to provide fresh mechanics to strategic gaming.

name: My Sexy Neighbor
description: My Sexy Neighbor is an immersive real-time visual novel for adults that transports players into the tense and emotionally rich world of neighborhood dynamics and mysterious relationships

name: Starship Coaster
description: Surf the black holes to high scores! Steer your rocket away from crazy arcade cosmic dangers and try to be the fastest, survive the longest, or get as much points as you can. Space is hard, be prepared!

name: Rake Remastered
description: Survive the pursuit of a monstrous predator in "Rake Remastered," a tribute to the 2015 original. Uncover mysteries armed with traps and cameras. Outsmart the Rake, survive the nightmare.

name: Catagrams
description: Catagrams is a word puzzle game for iOS and Android, featuring charming illustrations, a relaxing challenge, and a cute cat theme.

name: Rock 'N Racing Off Road & Grand Prix
description:
This pack includes the games: Grand Prix Rock 'N Racing and Rally Rock 'N Racing.

Enjoy 2 games in 1 with this irresistible speed games pack!

name: Hole io: Gold Edition
description: Show who is the biggest black hole in the entire universe!

name: Boti: Byteland Overclocked - Deluxe Edition
description: The Boti: Byteland Overclocked experience + 4 add-on DLCs, soundtrack & artbook

name: Golfslinger
description:
An explosive mix of golf and shooting! Use a varied arsenal to launch your ball into a frantic multiplayer chaos!

Be the world best in the racing solo races or face off against up to 12 players in stylized Westernpunk environments and prove you're the best of the Golfslingers!

A game made for tryharder and having fun with your friends !

name: Krashimals
description: Krashimals is a chaotic, physics-driven party game where you play as adorable animals and crash into friends for ultimate mayhem! Smash through stylized arenas, challenge modes, use power-ups, and enjoy the fun. Customize your Krashimals hats, karts and wheels and battle to be the last one standing!

name: Chernobylite: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Mariostro Strikers: Soccer League
description:
Dive into the thrilling world of arcade-style soccer with [Your Game Name Here]! Experience the excitement of 4v4 matches, where every player counts. With 10 unique and fun teams to choose from, you’ll dribble, pass, and shoot your way to victory while defending your goal with a skilled goalkeeper.

Designed for fast-paced fun, this game focuses on easy-to-learn controls and engaging gameplay. Whether you’re sprinting down the field, setting up the perfect assist, or unleashing a powerful shot on goal, every moment is packed with action and excitement.

name: Dim
description: Dim, a wandering soul whose light is constantly fading, must use the various abilities it possesses to traverse the dark and dangerous world surrounding it. Jumping through platforms and other dangers, the player must guide this lost soul through the darkness before its light runs out.

name: Witch Stories
description: First-person retro horror RPG. Non-linear, open world, branching dialog, voice acted, simple controls, and tons of easter eggs to discover. Set in the 1700s. You are a woman living in a cottage in the forest with your husband and newborn baby. Your story unfolds over two days, whether you choose to act or not.

name: Your Android
description: Your life is changed forever when a mysterious package arrives at your front door. Go on many different outings with your new android companion as you both form unforgettable memories in this beautiful visual novel.

name: FlipCat
description: FlipCat is a 2D platformer with a unique perspective rotation mechanic. Explore 30 challenging levels as a curious cat, overcoming obstacles, solving puzzles, and uncovering hidden paths in a vibrant pixel art world. Fun for all ages!

name: Nezumidash
description: A minimal action platformer

name: Battle Royal: Battlegrounds Call
description: Where Survival is Earned, Victory is Inherited.

name: Bonk!
description: Action packed, lighthearted, fun. The party game for up to four players.

name: Die by Anything
description: Welcome to Die by Anything! Make the right choices to survive a “normal day” in the ordinary life of a student or die trying in ways you would never imagine. Trust nothing, no one and try to survive as you figure out what's going on.

name: Once Upon a Dungeon: Infinity
description: Travel through dark dungeons, defeat dangerous creatures, and collect unique loot as you play endlessly in this hardcore, traditional roguelike.

name: Base Blitz
description: Two teams battle it out in a high-stakes capture-the-flag competition. Set on resource-filled battlegrounds, each team must protect their base while devising strategies to infiltrate the enemy's. Your flag is perched on the roof of your base just out of enemy reach, but so is theirs. The only way in? Tear down their walls by gathering resources, crafting items such as pickaxes, bombs and cannons, and launch a full-scale blitz!

name: Red Blue Cell
description: This is a retro barrage flying shooting game. Drive a space fighter plane, shuttle between planets and space stations, and use powerful firepower to destroy enemy space battleships!

name: Undead Realm: Ego
description: Time stands still, space warps, whispers in the dark and indescribable things are approaching you step by step. You will embark on a survival journey with several strangers in a desolate and mysterious place, and immerse yourself in a horrible battle royale full of despair from the first perspective

name: Freedom Maker
description: Seek freedom and build an infinite deck. In a cyberpunk future, use strategy and skill to overthrow AI's domination. Freedom Maker is a unique RPG blending puzzles and action.

name: Boti: Byteland Overclocked - Bit Racing
description:
Buckle up everyone, we got some hovercraft races to do! The Bit Racing DLC adds a hovercraft garage and a collection of intricate race tracks to test your skills on.

Take on the clock to get the best time and reap the rewards for finishing in bronze, silver or gold. Collect and equip a slew of unique skins for your hovercraft to add some extra flair.

name: Marvel Rivals: Season 1 - Eternal Night Falls
description: Darkness engulfs New York as the Timestream Entanglement leaves Doctor Strange trapped in the Entangled Astral Plane, scattering the Darkhold pages. Dracula and Doctor Doom disrupt the moon’s orbit, plunging the city into eternal night and unleashing an army of vampiric creatures. With the world on the brink, the Fantastic Four join forces with iconic Marvel heroes, standing together in the epic battle to break the mystical darkness with science. Ignite the battle against Dracula with the Fantastic Four in Marvel Rivals!

name: Sheep Seeker
description: Sheep Seeker is a fast-paced, co-op 3D platformer where you and a friend race through dynamic levels to catch every sheep as fast as possible.

name: MyPawnShop
description:
Have you always dreamed of running your own pawn shop? Now it's possible with MyPawnShop!

You can buy and sell hundreds of items of many different types. Musical instruments, weapons, art objects and much more!

Become rich by negotiating with your customers when buying and selling.

Clean and repair your items to earn even more money, with different tools at your disposal (found at different vendors in the game).

Manage your store as you wish with different storage units available as well as your storage reserve to temporarily store your items to be repaired or cleaned.

name: Ball Race Party
description: Ball Race Party is a game where you race against time or other players with your physical ball. You can play single player or multiplayer.

name: Jump! The Floor Is...
