description: Do you remember the excitement of hopping from spot to spot, avoiding the ”Lava”? We’re bringing back those childhood memories with a game inspired by the fun we all had growing up. You can test your reflexes, strategy, and competitive spirit. The goal is simple: be the first to reach the trophy.

name: PiMon
description: PiMon are virtual pets that live right on your PC! Take care of your PiMon while you do your daily tasks. Train them, update them into new forms, raise PiMon together or battle with your friends. Or do none of that and raise your PiMon your way! Welcome Admin, what kind of PiMon will you raise?

name: Coffee Express
description: Open your own coffee shop and become a barista in the cozy and colorful world of Coffee Express! A unique experience awaits you with stock tracking, realistic coffee making experience and shop customizations. Make your customers happy by making excellent coffee in your own coffee paradise!

name: The Redundant
description: Step into the metallic boots of an abandoned robot and fight back against an army of virus-infected machines. Sneak or battle your way around the facility, uncover its secrets, and isolate each section from the network - before it's too late...

name: Terror Diversion
description: A text-based horror game in which you investigate mysterious urban legends. Along the way, the player takes on the role of a character who gets “lost” and encounters a series of random events.

name: Freedom Wars Remastered
description: Born into a one-million-year prison sentence, you must survive deadly missions to earn any hope of freedom. Die in prison or live on the battlefield. The choice is yours.

name: Adventure Paws
description: Adventure Paws is a pixel-style 2D side-scrolling adventure game where you and your friend will play as two cats, embarking on an exciting journey across a mysterious and unknown continent. Join the black and white cats and set off on this journey full of challenges and surprises!

name: Unless
description: Take a trip back to the nostalgic era of platforming games built without gimmicks or a story. Race through bite-sized levels solo, or with a co-op helper to get the best time among your friends, or maybe even the world!

name: Status One
description: Status One is a top-down 3D tactical shooter where you create your own task force from scratch and lead your squad while being personally on the field

name: Hop 'n' Marty
description: Hop 'n' Marty is a retro 3D platformer for the modern age. Journey through sprawling worlds to find all of the collectables and meet the eccentric inhabitants within. Rescue the captured pygmies who have been trapped in cages and bring them back to safety.

name: Carnival of Souls
description: Embark on Carnival of Souls, a first-person roguelite shooter where strategic weapon choices and upgrades are key to uncovering chilling secrets across otherworldly dimensions.

name: The Shadow Over Cyberspace
description: Dread whispers echo across the Information Superhighway. Y2K is coming, heralding the rise of the Old Ones. With your meatspace mind unraveling, time is running out -- barter with gods, embrace the deathless aeons, or go offline permanently in this modempunk horror story.

name: Checkout: Cashier Simulator
description: Checkout is a cute point-and-click pixel art cashier simulation game. Work shifts throughout the year and seasons, earn as many points as you can within each shift's time limit, and get to know your coworkers.

name: Unpossess
description: Unpossess is a 1-4 co-op exorcism simulator game set in the early 1900s. Players take on the role of exorcists responsible for addressing cases of human possession.

name: All Fridges are Psychotic
description: Roll Camera: Julius Brown's Adventure Begins!A retro-style point-and-click adventure, helping Julius Brown get to the Californian film-maker competition.Julius will negotiate puzzles, time travel and weak coding to try and win his ultimate prize.

name: BattleTanks
description: Welcome to BattleTanks! Join friends to defend animals from moles in co-op game. Explore 5 worlds with 80+ missions. Face bosses, gather tank parts, and craft your machine. Play with up to 4 friends. Ready to save the world?

name: Quarrel Hill
description: Single button - Push or slash. Anything to get them off the hill. Side effects might include sneezing, freezing, farting, poisoning, healing, or setting on fire.

name: Corrupted Paradise
description: Paradise Club is known to the wealthy as the island of all fantasies. The leaders cater to every need: young women, submissives, strippers, twins, etc... Our two heroes arrive on the island to solve the mystery surrounding the disappearance of their half-sister.

name: Dumb Castle
description: The Dumb Castle is just made to bully players! Jump into the castle with your friends and get bullied by the various maps and levels waiting for you with some horror elements!

name: Coins & Wishpalm
description: You'll enter a peculiar world locked by tides, transitioning between day and night every half a month. As a knights, your fate will determine everything. Conquer beasts, evade dangers, and reap rewards! In this open world, there are no obligations—your choices define your path!

name: The Inn-Sanity
description: Early 90s. You stayed in a quiet hotel for just one night and the next morning you’ve found out that the old world was destroyed. Alien dreams, secrets of your past and other guests that are turning into monsters. This hotel will not let you to check out.

name: Survivor Challenge TD
description: Survivor Challenge TD plunges you into an epic struggle for survival against an oncoming horde of monsters. Arm yourself with the most formidable and thrilling weapon combinations and abilities as you brace for an ultimate showdown against a powerful boss!

name: Cards of Clotho
description: Cards of Clotho is a roguelite autobattler where you summon legendary heroes and conquer mythical realms! Weave your strategy and hold the Fates of Gods in your hands!

name: The Unlife of Gorlak
description: The Unlife of Gorlak is an RPG Where you play as a dragon who died but got better (or is at least trying to). You have been resurrected as a skeletal dragon by a necromancer. As you returned to the living world you felt the presence of the hero who had slain you has given chase. You have one month to prepare for his arrival so you can tell him how you really feel about him!

name: Sleembo
description: Help Bo wake up! Control ragdoll physics in freefall, collect fragments, avoid obstacles from her subconscious, and open the awakening portals. Unique biomes, mini-games, beautiful music, and the magical dream atmosphere await you!

name: The Other Me
description: The Other Me is a first-person psychological horror game delving into the realms of horror that prowl the recesses of one's psyche. Pursue the dread ruminations amidst the maelstrom of the Asylum. This game offers both mind-bending horror elements and realistic environments.

name: Siren's Call: Escape Velocity
description: A surreal, coming-of-age visual novel set in early 2010s Central Florida, "Siren's Call" is the small town you swore you'd always leave. Something inside of you knows that this is your last chance. Will you reach escape velocity?

name: Neotag League
description: Team up and beat your opponents in Neotag League, the sport from the future, where sci-fi parkour robots chase each other to score points! Jump, roll, wall run, grapple, dodge and attack in this team-based multiplayer game of Chase Tag.

name: Dungeon Defenders: Going Rogue
description: Combining tower defense, action RPG, and roguelite gameplay into a crazy free-for-all, where it’s you and up to three friends versus hordes of enemies. Select your hero, survive the waves of foes, unlock new weapons and runes, and take on the bosses that await you!

name: A Marble's Muse
description: Will you be able to find love and create art in Liliana, a colorful land full of marbles?

name: Walk
description: You can walk freely in the world of Walk, enjoy the beauty of the virtual world, and let the wonderful scenery bring comfort to your soul.

name: Calcification
description: Calcification is a short exploration of waiting, losing faith, and watching all around you turn to dust. After the failure of the villain’s plan, you play as a boss in a dungeon. Abandoned by the interest of heroes you languish awaiting a fate that will never come. Made in RPG Maker MZ.

name: House of Ghosts and Cats
description: Protect your cat, defeat the monsters, and build a happy home for your cat. Battles, crafting, exploration and conversations lead to the truth of the mansion and the whereabouts of your cat. A dark and heartwarming mansion-robbing horror adventure begins.

name: Windborn: Journey to the South
description: Guide your bird south, staying with your flock. Soar through speed boosts, embrace the skies, and don’t fall behind. Can you keep up?

name: Boo! Are you scared? The Chests Game
description: Boo! Are you scared? Don't be afraid, I'm a friend. Play the «Chests» card game for souvenirs with your new friend.

name: The Paddy Field
description: I was walking along the rice paddy path with my dog ​​Bonta. That was all I wanted to do. My ordinary daily life was suddenly shattered.

name: Stupid Cars
description:
These drivers are, you guessed it… STUPID!
They need your help. Using Hand Tracking or Controllers, select their vehicles to change speed and guide them as they merge into the flow of traffic. But be careful, these cars can’t stop… if there’s a collision, it’s all over.
Perfect for casual players, but also offering optional challenges for the purists. Adjustable playing position to get you right down into the action and, for a more immersive experience, try Mixed Reality Mode.
Designed to be one of the most challenging "One More Go" games around, it features.

name: 2 in 1: Trash Punk & Moto Rush GT
description:
Ultimate motorbike racing experience for all ages!
Rock the apocalypse in punk style!

name: Eggconsole Ys II MSX2
description: A grand story unfolds in the ancient kingdom of Ys. The raging development that unravels the many settings inherited from the previous title is a must-see!

name: Hentai Girls: Adorable Angel
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Princesses Lylop: Royal Puzzle Challenge
description: Assemble 60 stunning princess puzzles, from elegant portraits to fantasy scenes. Test your skills, immerse in magic, and discover them all!

name: Rodgerbints: Romance and Scandal in High Society
description: Experience a story of glamour, romance and secrets. Make key decisions that will change the fate of the characters. Every choice matters!

name: Cash Guardian: Collector Operation "Capital Defense"
description: Defend your cash, outsmart the heist!

name: Epyka
description: Epyka is an adventure, puzzle, narrative VR caper into the mysteries and blunder of a forgotten society. Reveal secrets by deciphering clues, decoding hidden messages, and revealing veiled pathways on your quest to finish what your father started and finding out what happened to the world's first civilization. The game's short length and squabble from characters doesn't diminish the fact that Epyka is incredibly charming and the gameplay is so intriguing all the way through that your only complaint might be that you want more.

name: Soul Of Dragon
description: Sin descripción

name: Burger Race
description: Get ready to race at top speed in Burger Race! Which machine will be the first to cross the finish line?

name: Cursed Digicam
description: You receive a cursed digital camera that captures ghosts from a strange website. The website allows you to liberate your loved ones by uploading images of their spirits using the camera. You decide to go to the nearest park where your girl was last seen.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: In Search of the Sun
description:
Version 8.0 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes
• New Part 2 Story Chapter VII: Bouquets of Unfulfilled Wishes
• New Part 2 Open World: Tower of Ruimu: God
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Reign Solaris (Durandal)
• New Featured Event: Countdown: To Sweet Dreams!
• ...and more!

name: Snails vs. Humans
description: Let the battle between snails and humans begin!

name: Human Within
description: Human Within combines an original branching storyline with video game playability. Its unique blend of storytelling and gameplay offers players a one-of-a-kind interactive experience.

name: Detective Mikami
description: The outbreak has hit the entire world like a truck. Yet, in some respects, the infestation of the population has affected Mikami and Hirano the most. That is because the two of them are so unlike one another yet they are stuck together, trying to live through this new, dangerous world.

name: Tanbo
description: "Tanbo" is a short walking simulator horror game in which you take a walk along a rice paddy path at night with your dog, Bonta.

name: Skate City: New York
description: Navigate the iconic streets of New York City as you master hundreds of tricks in famous, real-world skate spots. Jump over taxis, dodge pedestrians and string together impressive combos to land your highest scores.

name: Three Kingdoms Heroes
description: Sin descripción

name: The Rangers in the South
description: Purge the lands in this 2.5D HD-2D Pixelart RogueLike ARPG! Create hundreds of characters with unique strategies and abilities, face hordes of enemies, explore different biomes, procedurally generated dungeons, and obtain unique items!

name: TCG Empire: Card Shop Simulator
description: Unleash your entrepreneurial spirit in a world of trading cards!

name: Chained Towards Heaven
description: Climb from hell to paradise, bound by chains and teamwork!

name: Space Survivors
description: Annihilate hordes of enemy ships with devastating, unique, and powerful weapons upgrades! In Space Survivors, a survivor-like game with roguelite elements, every move could mean victory or death! head back to your station, hack cargo for pets and powerful cores, and prepare for an even tougher run!

name: Fizz Quiz
description: FizzQuiz is a trivia game with over 100 topics and 10,000 questions. Play alone or with up to 10 friends in seven unique rounds, featuring questions in text, images, models, and audio formats.

name: Find Cats 3
description: “A cute game for cat lovers of all ages! There are several maps and the opportunity to look for furry ones that are hiding intelligently!”

name: Penguin Panic!
description: A penguin's life is never easy. Even more so when you're a penguin mother, looking to protect her eggs. Penguin Panic is a cute platformer and features simple controls, secret challenges and cheerful graphics. A fast-paced action game that no one will want to put down.

name: Svarog's Dream: Return of the Old Gods
description: Bringing more action, expanding on the story, and everything else you liked in the core game.

name: N3Rally
description: 'N3Rally' combines a charming aesthetic with intense racing action. Drive a range of vehicles, from production cars to rally cars, and master various terrains such as tarmac, gravel, and snow!

name: S4U: Citypunk 2011 and Love Punch
description: This is a modern adventure of young adults seeking love and meaning. Return to 2011's Castor Yard, tap on your keyboard, and make those letters dance: Use your online persona to make meaningful decisions for your clients and yourself.

name: Nexus Knights
description: In "Nexus Knights," players embark on an exhilarating journey through time and dimensions, battling against the forces of chaos to preserve the stability of the universe. As Nexus Knights, they must hone their skills, forge alliances, and unravel the secrets of the multiverse.

name: Rouge Tank
description: 2D Tank Bullet Hell with powerups, and endless enemies. Play for your personal Highscore

name: Victory Away: Three Kingdoms
description: Victory Away：Three Kingdoms is a traditional battle chess game where you will play the role of Liu Bei and embark on the journey of reviving the Han dynasty.

name: School Hero
description: Immerse yourself in this nostalgic yet modern blend of arcade-style action and anime storytelling, as Sakura high calls for a new Hero to rise in style. Will you answer the call and save the day?

name: CapitalismCraft
description: Welcome to the wonderful world of capitalism! Exploit your workers to earn money! Hire managers to crush their spirits and drive them harder, then fire them once you’ve achieved your ends! Be agile, ruthless, merciless, become the richest CEO in the world, winning in rapid clicker management!

name: Cruel
description: Fight your way through 10 floors with powerful guns, crunchy melee weapons and a mighty kick. Although you'd better be fast, as you only have one life, and you're on the clock!

name: Robinson Alchemy
description: Robinson Alchemy is an alchemy game set on a deserted island where the objects you connect are the ones you first need to find and harvest.

name: Starcade Factions
description: Starcade Factions is a turn-based strategy game where space commanders battle ships in short action-packed games.

name: The Watcher
description: Our heroes hear about a strange land, where everything become pixel, so they come to find out what happen here.

name: The Last Flame
description: Recruit special heroes, fight deadly encounters, loot and craft powerful gear, discover and create unique synergetic builds! The Last Flame is an endless roguelike auto-battler in which you guide a righteous party of heroes through many challenges.

name: Little Fighters on Stream
description: Little Fighters on Stream is a compilation of action, skill and memorization mini games in which you can play directly with the Twitch chat on your stream using simple commands.

name: Nox Dash
description: Put on your headphones and feel the beats in a vibrant world. Explore caves, dodge deadly traps, and search for the lost gold coins.

name: My Slime Garden
description: Raise, nurture, and breed adorable slimes in a relaxing adventure where each slime is unique! Mix traits to create new slime companions and explore endless islands filled with secrets and surprises. Your perfect slime squad is waiting—how far can they go?

name: Greed & Darkness
description: Greed & Darkness is an atmospheric puzzle game where you must venture into a foreboding fortress to gather riches. Use sight, sound and the tools at hand to navigate the dark tunnels and unlock the Gorged One's chamber.
A arcade game that combines a cozy atmosphere with maze exploration. Avoid the wasps, collect honey and get back to the beehive !!!

name: Arcade Archives: vs. Family Tennis
description:
Use a variety of shots to confuse your opponent
and seize victory!

name: Beautiful Sakura: Fashion Club
description: A continuation of Kaito's journey.

name: DC Task Force
description: DC Task Force is a game where you explore the DC universe, visiting classic cities and planets, assembling your own Justice League team and recruiting members to protect planet Earth from an alien invasion. This campaign can be completed in just over an hour, but would require at least 7 hours to explore the entire universe and recruit all possible characters.

name: An Outland Village
description: A father and mother visit their daughter's home in Beijing to discuss their father's understanding of life and memories of their past relationship with their mother. A short, free narrative-focused game.

name: Sokocrab
description: Step onto the sandy shores of SokoCrab, a captivating puzzle game where you guide a clever crab through 40 engaging levels. Your mission? Push barrels onto designated spots to clear the path to the next stage, all while navigating a vibrant beach-themed world.

name: Rivenaar's Grove
description: Harvest ingredients for potions to prove your worth as the apprentice of a skilled magician!

name: Kavernum
description: Winston Bradley is an amateur explorer who is always looking for new adventures. His latest destination is a cave in Algeria, which is known for it famous cave paintings. But the further he goes into the cave, the more he realizes that something is wrong with it.

name: Clavis Kinkygate: Treasure of Danau River
description: An addictive 2D side-scrolling adventure game with challenges and exciting erotic elements. Players take on the role of Ambrosio as he embarks on an adventure where he must confront the lust of Devil's Cove, defeat exciting bosses and have passionate interactions with a variety of characters.

name: Reviver
description: A narrative puzzle game with themes of love, fate and time. Follow the life stories of the two main characters and influence their destinies through interactions and choices. The game combines hand-drawn style and an immersive interactive experience to explore a profound journey of love and choice.

name: Kitchinko
description: Join the Kitchen Crew as they make different meals from around the world! Fire away at the pegs on screen to be able to clear out the red plus pegs, and advance to different levels! Race to get the fastest time and brag to your friends!

name: Commander Tiberius Troubleson
description:
An unforgiving handcrafted action roguelite where secrets abound and death makes you stronger.
Fight your way through hordes of creatures using powerful spells, potent skills, permanent upgrades and lots of bullets.

CTT is a fast-paced roguelite platformer focused on action rather than platforming, featuring handcrafted levels. Fight your way through hordes of creatures using powerful spells, potent skills, permanent upgrades, and lots of bullets. Discover the secrets of Anarth, explore intriguing landscapes and face terrible foes.

Levels are handmade and selected from a large pool. Each one has a unique layout, different secrets and unique items, guaranteeing a truly unique run every time you die.

Death is a learning experience! Upon dying you can permanently upgrade different skills and face the challenge again, stronger.

You will come across powerful spells to help you along the way. Every spell you acquire will always be at the tips of your fingers. You can switch and combine them at your pleasure and wreak havoc among your enemies.

As well as spells, you will equip passive upgrades to increase your chances of success. Improve your bullets and skills as well as many other perks. You can equip up to 6 upgrades at any given time, swapping them and combining them as you like to find the most optimal or most fun way to play.

name: Discolored 2
description: All the colors have gone missing from the world. While on a mission to bring them back you discover you are being hunted by those who would see the colors banished. Your only hope is a woman in red who may be holding the key to preventing the world from becoming discolored.

name: Warden's Will
description: Warden’s Will is a fast paced movement shooter roguelite, playable solo or in up-to 3 player co-op. Choose your Warden, master unique movements and abilities, and overpower hordes of robots in intense battles. Fly, dash, smash, and turn bullet-hell into bullet-heaven!

name: Behind Glass: Aquarium Simulator
description: From the creators of the renowned Fish Farm series for mobiles: Aquascape your very own fish tanks on your PC. Featuring our latest 3D aquarium engine, you can enjoy the details of lifelike fish, plants, decorations, algae, etc. Topped with realistic 3D effects, your monitor becomes a fish tank.

name: Builders of Egypt
description: Builders Of Egypt is a city-building economic strategy taking place in the Nile Valley. Immerse yourself in a world full of pyramids, where you will become a part of the ancient world. Create history, be history!

name: My Summer Car
description: My Summer Car is the ultimate car owning, building, fixing, tuning, maintenance AND permadeath life survival simulator. You start the game with hundreds of loose parts and assemble both car and engine.

name: Battle Cars
description: Where speed meets destruction. Drive fast, shoot faster. Race, fight, winGet ready for high-octane PvP multiplayer battles in Battle Cars!

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Tank of the Month: AltProto AMX 30
description:
With its reliable gun and strong frontal turret armor, the AltProto AMX 30 makes an excellent sniper to play in hull-down positions. Use its mobility to find the perfect spot for your ambush ... then catch the enemy by surprise by hitting 'em hard!

Make the AltProto AMX 30 yours with the Tank of the Month bundle. You'll also receive Silver Boosters and Premium Account time for extra earnings and Gold to fine-tune your vehicles with everything you need.

Bundle includes:
• AltProto AMX 30 French Tier VIII Medium Tank
• 850 Gold
• 3 Days of Premium Account
• (10) x1.5 Silver Boosters

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: Star Wars Outlaws: Deluxe Edition
description:
With the Star Wars Outlaws Deluxe Edition, get the game, the Ultimate pack, and a digital art book.

Experience the first-ever open world Star Wars game and explore distinct locations across the galaxy. Risk it all as scoundrel Kay Vess. Fight, steal, and outwit your way through the galaxy's crime syndicates as you join the galaxy's most wanted.

name: Hullbreaker
description: A fusion of arena PvP combat on the high seas and roguelite mechanics. Outfit your ship with powerful weapons, clash with rival captains on the high seas, and create your own flag to hoist over the shipwrecks!

name: Ocean of Eyes
description:
they're watching you
find them
look them in the eye

name: League of Legends: 2025 Season One - Welcome to Noxus
description: Welcome to Noxus is the first thematic season of 2025 in League of Legends.

name: Skystead Christmas
description: In this festive-themed hidden object game, every click costs a snowball, and every snowball requires some snow! Collect snowflakes as they are falling and try and find all 24 Skylets to win!

name: Hello Love: 18 Again
description: Unexpectedly back at 18, you embark on a thrilling and sweet campus rebirth journey with the memories! The campus goddess, the sexy girl, the childhood sweetheart, the frigid CEO, the gentle teacher. Who will ignite your heart among the dreams and regrets of youth? Relive old dreams without regrets!

name: Hell Dive
description: A first-person horror game where you play as Daniel, a Maritime Operative trapped alone aboard a submarine. Sent to investigate an abandoned deep-sea colony, you uncover dark secrets as terrifying horrors await in its depths.

name: Platform Run
description: Run and complete different kinds of platforms. Platform Run is a 3D platform game where you can interact with different platforms and score.

name: Destiny 2: Revenant - Act 3
description: Fikrul’s forces await in the depths of his Revenant fortress. Gather your allies, Guardian, for a new Kell will be crowned.

name: Take Notes
description: Take Notes is a puzzle game set in the near future within a bunker filled with 40 unique puzzles. Prepare yourself for a mind-bending adventure where every puzzle solved brings you one step closer to stopping the unthinkable

name: Lightracer: For Judge
description: In a dystopian future, as The Judge with immense power, you journey through space to find hope in a divided society. This sci-fi adventure explores hope amidst adversity.

name: CatboyZoom
description: Become a catboy and zoom through the many handcrafted worlds in this FPS Platforming Speedrunner! Master your control over the source-inspired movement system and leave your best times for others to challenge!

name: Pinball Storm: Lokanta
description: Pinball Storm:Lokanta is a RPG game combing Roguelike and pinball gameplay. You will be part of the resistance against plutocracy. Use your marble pinball to eliminate waves of enemies, and collect resources to further enhance your pinball. Save the world from hell!

name: Chocolate Factory Simulator
description: Enter the world of steam and sugar and become a master chocolatier in Chocolate Factory Simulator. Craft gourmet chocolate for your customers in your steampunk workshop with the help of your automaton assistant Nougat.

name: Sea Fantasy
description: Save the world by fishing! This is a brand new action RPG game where you stand on an adventure to fish the SeaAZ, the marine life of this world, in a vast pixel world. This is not a peaceful fishing game. The destruction of the world is imminent....

name: Guardian's Guide
description: A daughter raising sim/RPG

name: Envious
description: Experience the horror puzzle game, Envious, offering both single player and co-op modes. Choose to be Xavier or Xandra where the first is trapped in a house, trying to escape it, while Xandra explores a separate old house to uncover clues facilitating Xavier's escape.

name: Steam Engine Simulator: Power Generation
description: Power a city in Steam Engine Simulator.

name: Plebs & Pillagers
description: Rebuild your kingdom in this village management game. Command your loyal villagers to help you on your quest, and to expand your realm while defending it from unknown threats.The king has returned!

name: Nanoplanet Survivors
description: "Nano Planet": A space exploration game where you use advanced tech to terraform an exoplanet, build farms and establish a colony. Similar to "Stardew Valley". Build relationships with aliens, uncovering planet's secrets. Pixel art, immersive story, unique blend of farming, adventure, and space.

name: Hightail
description: How far can you survive? This game will give you a challenge to survive the wildlands and collect miles as you drift in unknown direction and try to avoid obstacles.

name: Bowlout
description: This is not an ordinary bowling game! In BOWLOUT, you'll throw tons of bowling balls at rogue pins as you traverse the bowling center. Perform overhead or underhand throws, or simply grab a pin by the head and use it as a baseball bat.

name: Only Out
description: “Only Out” is a cooperative survival game for two players. Set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, you and your partner must navigate a desolate village plagued by scarcity and danger. Trust each other, strategize together, face the relentless zombie threat, and uncover the only path to survival.

name: Puzzle Adventures: Forest Animals
description: Easy to use puzzles for ages two and up. Featuring funny and cute animal motifs with 30 unique puzzles. 100% frustration free and child-safe.

name: 2024: Aliens Are Coming
description: An Indie Sci-Fi Adventure game that thrusts you into the heart of the secrecy surrounding UFOs and Aliens. Visit exotic places, meet Aliens, make alliances and enemies alike as you make critical decisions and fight for what you think is right. Time is short, because it's 2024, and Aliens Are Coming!

name: Screen Cat
description: Meet your new furry friend — Screen Cat! This cute kitty will settle right on your desktop, adding coziness and joy to your day.

name: Cats vs Cthulhu
description: Cats vs Cthulhu is a casual survivor-like where you play as a cat the Destroyer of the Great Old Ones. Arm yourself with yarns, fruits and other delicacies. Dress up in the most stylish outfit possible. Find a way to become the ultimate weapon.

name: [Stories to Tell] Greyville Stay
description:
"Stories to Tell" is a series of psychological horror games developed by a 15-year-old boy in which each installment is based on a dream or nightmare that I, the developer, have had. This is a game you won't want to miss...

Stories to Tell is a walking simulator, with dialogues between the character and npc`s. The game is in first person and it includes things such as being able to play games in your in-game pc and more...

name: Hide Time
description: Hide Time is a story-driven horror game filled with huge variety of puzzles where you play as an new employee of Passion Oasis. Explore that huge complex, do your tasks and uncover mysteries of your past.

name: Stimulation Clicker
description: Stimulation Clicker is a fast-paced clicker game where players click a button to accumulate "stimulation" points. These points can be used to automate point collection and unlock various upgrades and achievements. The game intentionally overloads the player with visual and auditory stimuli, mirroring the chaotic nature of the modern internet.

name: Fantasy Online 2
description: A rich 2D pixel art MMORPG full of adventure. Master diverse skills, join a guild, explore pixelated zones, and engage in simple fun MMORPG combat. Hundreds of items are waiting for you to collect across 4 characters! Join the fun today!

name: Writer. Chapter 1
description: You, the legendary writer, the “King of Horror,” find yourself at the center of a nightmare. A mysterious place, frighteningly familiar, hides sinister secrets. Explore locations, solve riddles, escape from the monster, collect a story that will become a new masterpiece... if you survive.

name: Cats of Mona Lisa: A Hidden Object Game
description: Step into the world of timeless art with a playful twist! Cats of Mona Lisa is a relaxing hidden-object game where you explore beautifully reimagined classical paintings in search of ten mischievous cats cleverly hidden within each masterpiece.

name: Benchmark Your Skills
description: With tests to measure and improve cognitive abilities such as memory, reflexes, and reaction time. Try it now and challenge your brain!

name: Murder&Spies
description: From the creator of hit mobile game "Spy.io" comes "Murder&Spies", a unique take on the multiplayer murder mystery genre. In this online social deduction game, every player is a spy with a single objective: eliminate your assigned target while staying hidden from the spy hunting you.

name: Energy Crush
description: This is a 2D online shooting game. Up to four players can play against each other. It is still in development, so there is only one mode and few types of players. I would like to hear the opinions of users, so I would appreciate it if you could review it even if it is a small thing.

name: Click Mage
description: Click Mage is a 2D resource clicker and building game. Mine and process resources, upgrade your clicking power and construct buildings on an idyllic island with beautiful pixel art graphics.

name: 4 Rush Together
description: "4 Rush Together" is a light-hearted and funny obstacle course game where you and your friends are tied together with a rope, adventuring through creative levels filled with fun. You can invite up to three friends to play together in local multiplayer or online co-op mode. What are you waiting for?

name: Bàito
description: Are you looking for a fun couch game up to 8 Players? Challenge your friends to reach the final score! Vote each round for your favorite modifier! Endless possible maps and combinations! Use your creativity to defeat your opponents and climb the leaderboard! Get ready and "Fai del Bàito"!

name: Cut the Birch
description: Take on the role of a hero whose main task is to cut down birch trees and destroy enemies. Use an axe and magic to do this. Acquire items and improve skills.

name: Cubin
description: Cubin is a first-person platform puzzle game that immerses you in the LGA experience. Complete 60 experiments to discover the truth about this simulation.

name: Terra Avoider
description: Terra Avoider is a 2.5D shooter in which the player must survive through difficult, arena based boss encounters.

name: Project Tower
description: Dive in Project Tower, a third-person shooter mixing intense bullet hell combat with a unique morphing ability. Imprisoned by the "Hiks", fight to the top of their deadly tower for freedom. Will you outsmart them and make your way out ?

name: Movie Quest
description: Remember the times at the movies? Maybe you've got friends all over the world or want to go on a virtual date? How will you get together to watch a movie? With Movie Quest you can! Settle down and watch a movie, quest, roleplay, challenge each other to get through a horror show!

name: Tactics of World War I
description: Tactics of World War I is a real time tactics (RTT) game that puts you in the role of a military leader in the First World War. It requires you to plan your actions thoroughly and make smart tactical decisions in the blink of an eye.

name: Exsys
description: Exsys is a Castlevania style, rough-like, beat em up game that takes you into the rich world of The System. Fight enemies, steal and use their body part as a weapon or equip as a new body part. As you explore the world and try to escape.

name: Toilet he Go 1+2
description: You can control main charactor "MORETA" to lead toilet space as soon as possible.

name: Unbothered
description:
Drink beer
Smoke cigarettes
Spit on the ground

name: Fruity Rogue
description: Fruity Rogue is a fast-paced roguelike top-down shooter where everything revolves around fruits! Explore randomly generated levels, battle fruit enemies, collect items, and discover game-changing synergies. With each run, unlock characters and weapons, each with their own playstyle and abilities.

name: Amenti
description: A photographer enters the Great Pyramids to photograph Pharaoh Rudamon’s remains, but is soon overwhelmed by a sinister curse, as the ancient tomb awakens dark forces that claw at his sanity.

name: Ritual
description: A single player episode with 6+4 levels and start map made by Zothique and Sock.

name: The Basement Ritual
description: The Basement Ritual is a short indie horror game where you have been kidnapped and must escape a cult’s basement premises solving puzzles and hiding from a demonic creature.

name: Ninja Remix
description: Build your clan, unleash unique jutsus, and expand with unique ninjas. Dive into battles with multiplayer modes, featuring both co-op and PvP, all set to a cool Phonk beat.

name: Falcon 2023
description: You will play the role of a new special police officer who arrives in the dangerous city of Flora. Various violent incidents continue to occur, and the sheriff hires and trains personnel from the outside world in an attempt to fight the terrorists to the death. This operation is codenamed Falcon

name: Sassy Girl
description: Working in a gossip magazine. Being surrounded by beautiful women, and having incredible erotic adventures!

name: Paper Planes
description: Take your role as protector and defend your assets from enemy squadrons or engage in devastation as the attacker. Fly with the best PaperPlane pilots in the world in hand crafted parks with an abundance of enemies to destroy. PaperPlanes is an Arcade team-flight-sim, base defender and battleroyale.

name: Pollute & Conquer
description: An economic war over territories and resources is raging on the planet. Will you destroy the planet and all life on it in the chaos of pollution... or prevent the end of the world by developing new technologies?

name: Railbreak: Arcade Onslaught Collection
description: Arcade on-rails insanity leads this horrifying collection of adventures!

name: Roller-Skating
description: Roller-skate through challenging stages!

name: Ball Cannon
description: Sin descripción

name: Dekiai Heart Candy Kun.
description: This is the otome game that you can experience living together with a slightly twisted boyfriend.

name: Puck
description: Hop on your skates and jump into a physics based hockey game. No rules, no timeouts, just get the puck in the goal. May the best team win!

name: AnderKant 2
description: Get ready for AnderKant 2, with more dreamy visuals and great music to inspire your soul while you're pondering about your next project or journey. Prepare to explore 7 abstract environments with 7 tracks each carefully crafted for a unique vibe for each world.

name: Island of Sacrifice
description: An indie horror and puzzles game created by a solo developer using the Unreal Engine 5 (UE5). Challenge your mind, think differently, and immerse yourself in a unique and thrilling experience.

name: Universe of Trials
description: Universe of Trials is a multiplayer climbing game with fun modes. Race to the top, dodge hazards in "Floor is Lava," survive in "Falling Floor," or outlast everyone in "Last to Leave." Compete, climb, and conquer the leaderboards!

name: Sex Industry XXX
description: Sex Industry XXX is a unique game that combines elements of visual novel and clicker, allowing you to immerse yourself in the world of the adult film industry.

name: I'm Not Crazy
description: I'm Not Crazy is a surreal top down puzzle adventure game. Solve puzzles, explore and play micro games.

name: Hypotheses on the Symmetry between Vision and Hands
description: The hypothesis regarding vision-hands symmetry is a validation experiment where separate characters are controlled with the left and right hands. It measures the connectivity and enhancement of cognitive character recognition through both hands and vision.

name: Horde Survivor
description: Battle hordes of monsters in this top-down roguelite arena bullet hell game. Choose what character to play, what stat to gain, and which spell to learn. Every decision matters in your survival against the hordes of monsters.

name: Age of Survival
description: Age of Survival is survival simulation crafting game from Seattletek. Your player has been stranded on an island not far off of the coast of Africa where you will encounter creatures like boar, elephant, lions, hippos, crocs, rhinos, and tons of sea life.

name: Gas Station Simulator and Party Time DLC Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Precision Platform Bundle
description: Come have fun with this challenging precision platform bundle!

name: Near-Death-Expedition
description: After quitting the job, you were casually browsing a video site when you saw a strange video with a blank thumbnail. "Can you hear me? Can you see me...?" The next day, you receive a message requesting you to be the manager of the mysterious VTuber "Owarino Rinne". The endless journey begins.

name: The Mansion of The Macabre
description: Explore the Crowley Manor and unravel the secrets of the Occult. Inspired by the Works of HP Lovecraft and a love letter to classic 90’s survival horror games.

name: Titanigods
description: Welcome to the world of Titanigods!

name: Moo & Move: Extra Grazing Grounds
description: Guide the hungry cow to its goal. Place directional tiles on the ground and to solve the puzzles. Watch as the cow follows the path to reach its tasty hay.

name: Julian & Friends
description: Join Julian and his friends in this psychological horror experience inspired by point-n-click computer games from the early 2000s. Witness many shenanigans with characters from the infamous 98xx.

name: The Zombie Fortress
description: A zombie game where killing means surviving.
